'''Amandeep''' is a researcher mentioned by several [[NPC]]s in [[Port Ormos]], [[Sumeru]]. He graduated from [[Haravatat]], but is also well-versed in [[Spantamad]] and [[Kshahrewar]] subjects.<ref>{{Ref/BB|Port Ormos Bulletin Board|Amandeep's Advertisement}}</ref>

==Profile==
Amandeep is a long-time resident of [[Port Ormos]] and makes a living by mentoring young researchers.<ref name="Sareh">{{Ref/NPC|Sareh}}</ref>

A few days before the [[Traveler]] arrived at [[Port Ormos]], there was a sea monster warning, so Amandeep went out to observe with some [[Eremites]] on a ship. Current whereabouts of him, as well as the ship and its crew, are unknown.<ref name="Sareh" /><ref>{{Ref/NPC|Neriman}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/NPC|Araby}}</ref>
